quotes.quote: I have learned for myself that the promises of the Lord are sure.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Joseph Smith (2007), 167

quotes.quote: The greatest and most important duty is to preach the Gospel.
Truth is eternal.
quotes.source: Teachings of the Prophet Joseph Smith, 357

quotes.quote: Faith is the moving cause of all action in temporal concerns, so it is in spiritual.
The earth will be smitten with a curse unless there is a welding link of some kind or other between the fathers and the children.
...every accomplishment, every refined art, and useful discovery in science is the result of the operations of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.source: Discourses of Brigham Young, sel. John A. Widtsoe (1954), 12

quotes.quote: Do all you can; and then, if you cannot do all that you wish, be contented.
quotes.source: Teachings of Brigham Young, sel. Clyde N. Williams (1954), 299

quotes.quote: You educate a man for something. If you educate him for good, then he is good. If you educate him for evil, he will be evil.
Let us make a heaven of our homes.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Brigham Young (1997), 305

quotes.quote: Every ordinance that the Lord has revealed is for the exaltation of his children.

name: Alma the Younger
role: Chief Judge and High Priest of Nephites

quotes.quote: ...faith is not to have a perfect knowledge of things; but to hope for things which are not seen, which are true.
...if ye have faith ye can do all things which are expedient unto me.
And now, behold, I say unto you, my brethren, that if ye will humble yourselves, and repent of all your sins, and witness before God that ye are willing to serve him all the remainder of your days...
Preach unto them repentance, and faith on the Lord Jesus Christ; teach them to humble themselves and to be meek and lowly in heart.
The plan of restoration is requisite with the justice of God; for it is just that all things should be restored to their proper order.
Our Savior and Redeemer, Jesus Christ, performed the greatest act of love in the history of the universe when He atoned for all of us.
Counting our blessings is far better than recounting our problems.
The Lord loves effort, and He loves to bless those who try.
The covenant path is the way to eternal joy and happiness.
Each temple is a holy place where revelation flows constantly.

name: Henry B. Eyring
role: Second Counselor in the First Presidency

quotes.quote: The Lord's kindness leads us to repentance.
The greatest joy we can have is to know that we have helped someone else.
Our families can be a heaven on earth.
The Holy Ghost is a precious companion in all of our important decisions.
Daily prayer is the key to opening the powers of heaven in our personal lives.
God loves us. He loves us individually. He loves every one of us.
Behold, I say unto you that this is my gospel; and these are the things which I desire that ye should do.
…hold on, hold fast, hold on to the iron rod!
Don't you quit. You keep walking. You keep trying. There is help and happiness ahead.
No love in mortality comes closer to approximating the pure love of Jesus Christ than the selfless love a devoted mother has for her child.

name: Dallin H. Oaks
role: First Counselor in the First Presidency

quotes.quote: The Lord's way is not easy. It requires sacrifice—time, talents, and means.
Love is the greatest of all the commandments.
We should seek the companionship of the Holy Ghost.
Our testimonies can grow and develop and mature, just like we do.
Truth is truth, and it does not change according to our ability to stomach it emotionally, psychologically, or socially.
Hope smiles through the tears of sorrow.
…to forgive and to be forgiven are two of the highest of all human attributes.
The joy of our lives is inseparably connected with our love of God.
Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
Often, the answer to our prayer does not come while we're on our knees but while we're on our feet serving the Lord and serving those around us.
The Holy Ghost is the third member of the Godhead.
We are not alone in our struggles.
A testimony is a precious gift.
Learning by faith requires spiritual, mental, and physical exertion and not just passive reception.
Discipleship is not a spectator sport.

I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded, for I know that the Lord giveth no commandments unto the children of men, save he shall prepare a way for them that they may accomplish the thing which he commandeth them.
And it came to pass that I, Nephi, said unto my father: I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded.

And I did read many things unto them which were written in the books of Moses; but that I might more fully persuade them to believe in the Lord their Redeemer I did read unto them that which was written by the prophet Isaiah.
Wherefore, ye must press forward with a steadfastness in Christ, having a perfect brightness of hope, and a love of God and of all men.

And we talk of Christ, we rejoice in Christ, we preach of Christ, we prophesy of Christ, and we write according to our prophecies, that our children may know to what source they may look for a remission of their sins.
When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
I am like as yourselves, subject to all manner of infirmities in body and mind...
I tell you these things that ye may learn wisdom; that ye may learn that when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
If you should render all the thanks and praise which your whole soul has power to possess... ye would still be unprofitable servants.
For the natural man is an enemy to God, and has been from the fall of Adam, and will be, forever and ever, unless he yields to the enticings of the Holy Spirit, and putteth off the natural man.

name: Moroni
role: Last Nephite Prophet and Record Keeper

quotes.quote: And now, I, Moroni, would speak somewhat concerning these things; I would show unto the world that faith is things which are hoped for and not seen; wherefore, dispute not because ye see not, for ye receive no witness until after the trial of your faith.

Behold, I would exhort you that when ye shall read these things... that ye would ask God, the Eternal Father, in the name of Christ, if these things are not true; and if ye shall ask with a sincere heart, with real intent, having faith in Christ, he will manifest the truth of it unto you, by the power of the Holy Ghost.

And charity suffereth long, and is kind, and envieth not, and is not puffed up, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil, and rejoiceth not in iniquity but rejoiceth in the truth, beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
Wherefore, if a man have faith he must needs have hope; for without faith there cannot be any hope.
And if ye have no hope ye must needs be in despair; and despair cometh because of iniquity.

name: Mormon
role: Prophet, Military Leader, and Record Compiler

quotes.quote: And what is it that ye shall hope for? Behold I say unto you that ye shall have hope through the atonement of Christ and the power of his resurrection, to be raised unto life eternal.
...charity is the pure love of Christ, and it endureth forever; and whoso is found possessed of it at the last day, it shall be well with him.
For behold, the same that judgeth rashly shall be judged rashly again; for according to his works shall his wages be.
And I, Mormon, do write the things which have been commanded me of the Lord.
...be faithful unto Christ; and may not the things which I have written grieve thee, to weigh thee down unto death; but may Christ lift thee up.
I was not born a slave! I cannot, will not be a slave. I would not be a slave to God... I'd be His servant, friend, His son.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: John Taylor (2001), 75

quotes.quote: I testify that Joseph Smith was a Prophet of God, for I heard the voice of God declaring that he was.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: John Taylor (2001), 83

quotes.quote: The principles of truth and the principles of error in their own nature, are opposed to each other.
The priesthood is given for the blessing, happiness, and exaltation of the human family.
We are here to co-operate with God in this world... to build temples, and to administer therein.
We have not finished our work when we have done with ourselves. We will never finish our work until we save all that depends upon us.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Wilford Woodruff (2004), 192

quotes.quote: When our work is done, we will rest, but not before.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Wilford Woodruff (2004), 267

quotes.quote: The Lord will not deceive any man. If He has any revelation to communicate to His children, He will make no mistake in the delivering of it.
God has given us the power to stand as saviors upon Mount Zion, and kingdoms are put under our charge.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Wilford Woodruff (2004), 209

quotes.quote: I rely upon the Lord, and go ahead with my duty whatever it may be.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Wilford Woodruff (2004), 219

quotes.quote: Touch me not, for God shall smite you if ye lay your hands upon me, for I have not delivered the message which the Lord sent me to deliver.

And now ye have said that salvation cometh by the law of Moses. I say unto you that it is expedient that ye should keep the law of Moses as yet; but I say unto you, that the time shall come when it shall no more be expedient to keep the law of Moses.
And thus God breaketh the bands of death, having gained the victory over death; giving the Son power to make intercession for the children of men.
If Christ had not risen from the dead, or have broken the bands of death that the grave should have no victory, and that death should have no sting, there could have been no resurrection.
For behold, judgment is mine, saith the Lord.
Nothing can save this people save it be repentance and faith on the Lord Jesus Christ.
Behold, I give unto you a sign; for five years more cometh, and behold, then cometh the Son of God to redeem all those who shall believe on his name.
For behold, he surely must die that salvation may come; yea, it behooveth him and becometh expedient that he dieth, to bring to pass the resurrection of the dead.
And if ye believe on his name ye will repent of all your sins, that thereby ye may have a remission of them through his merits.
But behold, the resurrection of Christ redeemeth mankind, yea, even all mankind, and bringeth them back into the presence of the Lord.
As man now is, God once was; as God now is, man may be.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Lorenzo Snow (2012), 83

quotes.quote: The law of tithing is one of the most important ever revealed to man.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Lorenzo Snow (2012), 160

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of every Latter-day Saint to know the truth as God knows it.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Lorenzo Snow (2012), 75

quotes.quote: Every foundation stone that is laid for a Temple, and every Temple completed... lessens the power of Satan on the earth, and increases the power of God and Godliness.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Lorenzo Snow (2012), 142

quotes.quote: We are here that we may be educated in a school of suffering and of fiery trials.
quotes.source: Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Lorenzo Snow (2012), 117
